name: dynamic-demo-backend
description: A demo backend for the dynamic interview challange

scripts.dev: nodemon --exec npx sls offline start | pino-pretty
scripts.dev:doppler: doppler run -- nodemon --exec npx sls offline start | pino-pretty
scripts.migrate:generate: doppler run -- npx ts-node ./node_modules/typeorm/cli -d ./orm.config.ts migration:create migrations/

scripts-info.print: prints out the serverless yaml as it is generated, used for debugging
scripts-info.dev: Runs sls-offline backend locally, need to have env vars set your self
scripts-info.dev:doppler: uses the doppler cli to inject env vars, to run the backend locally
scripts-info.migrate:new: creates a new migration, pass in the migration name
scripts-info.migrate:generate: looks at the datasource and generates migrations as needed
scripts-info.migrate:up: Runs any outstanding migrations in the migrations folder

author: k@sparakis.com
